Method Detail

getApplicationModel

public ApplicationModel getApplicationModel()

subscribe

public void subscribe(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener,
                      java.lang.String channel)
This method implements the Publish / Subscribe pattern. It notifies this that the listener argument wants to received data sent on the channel given as argument

Parameters:
listener - The object that wants to received notification for the specific channel
channel - The channel onto the listener argument will be listening to

publish

public void publish(java.lang.String channel,
                    java.lang.Object value,
                    java.lang.Object secondaryValue)
This method implements the Publish / Subscribe pattern. It sends data to registered subscribers, on a specific channel.

Parameters:
channel - The channel data is sent to.
secondaryValue - the secondary value that comes with the value
value - The data to be sent.

publish

public void publish(java.lang.String channel,
                    java.lang.Object value)
This method implements the Publish / Subscribe pattern. It sends data to registered subscribers, on a specific channel.

Parameters:
channel - The channel data is sent to.
value - The data to be sent.

unsubscribe

public void unsubscribe(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener,
                        java.lang.String channel)
This method implements the Publish / Subscribe pattern. It unsubscribes the given listener from a given channel

Parameters:
listener - The listener that is going to unsubscribe
channel - The channel that the listener is about to unsubscribe
